Title: Tape 4, Side B
Writer: Jay Asher (book), Kirk A. Moore, Nic Sheff (story editor), Brian Yorkey (creator)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Inspired by a friend's poetry reading, Hannah pours her heart out. Tony confides in Clay about the night of Hannah's death.
